Entries.Nul: This is amazing, @! Now I won't have to worry about eating algae for a while./-7 -26 -75 -79/This is very pretty, farmer,.. thank you... and thank you too, Player./-2 -12 -80/N-no thank you.../-5 -6 -27 456  457 812 814/...ew./-20 153 157/Thank you./-4

Entries.Nul0: Y-you... you really wish to wed me, @? A-are you sure? Oh dear, you won't regret your decision... I promise!!$3
Entries.Nul1: I'm so nervous for tomorrow, @. I feel as if I may pass out again.$4

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ and Nul first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if they'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, they're both going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#Let us celebrate that on this day, {0} of {1}, two different beings from two very different places are united in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ and Nul first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if they'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, they're both going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#Let us celebrate that on this day, {0} of {1}, two different beings from two very different places are united in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Nul... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you partners bound by Yoba!$h
